sentences.sContent: Yet in our view, the notion of "search neutrality" threatens innovation, competition and, fundamentally, your ability as a user to improve how you find information.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet in our view, the notion of "search neutrality" threatens innovation, competition and, fundamentally, your ability as a user to improve how you find information.
sentences.sCn: 但在我们看来“搜索中立”这个概念威胁创新，竞争和本质上的，你作为一个用户去提高你寻找信息的能力。

sentences.sContent: It is an identity that revolves around neutrality , and, yes , an awkward tradition of citizens' referendums .
sentences.sContent_eng: It is an identity that revolves around neutrality , and, yes , an awkward tradition of citizens' referendums .
sentences.sCn: 这是一个徘徊在中立周围的身份，也是一个对公民公投尴尬的传统。

sentences.sContent: They have been violently advocating neutrality.
sentences.sCn: 他们一直激烈地鼓吹中立。

words.tran: 中立的，中性的；中立国的；非彩色的
中性的；不及物的；无性的
中立国；中立者；非彩色；齿轮的空档
无性动物；中性名词；阉割动物
[化学] 中和；[化学] 中和作用；中立状态
[组织] 嗜中性粒细胞；[组织] 中性白细胞
中立化（neutralize的过去式和过去分词）
抵销；使…中和；使…无效；使…中立

trans.tranOther: the state of not supporting either side in an argument or war
